original_title: 痴漢電車　いたずらな指
overview: Two men get to know each other through their shared love of groping on the train, and fall into a bromance. They build a set that looks exactly like the train, and when they open a shop where people can come and play groper with their models inside of this set, it becomes very successful.
title: Chikan densha: Itazura na yubi
